title: 96/16/EC: Commission Decision of 18 December 1995 extending the period referred to in Article 15 (2a) of Council Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 December 1995 extending the period referred to in Article 15 (2a) of Council Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes (96/16/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 15 (2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC, '31 March 1995` is replaced by '31 March 1996`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66.
(2) OJ No L 56, 14. 3. 1995, p. 18.
(3) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(4) OJ No L 182, 2. 8. 1995, p. 17.
(5) OJ No L 2, 4. 1. 1996, p. 24.
